# 12 Best Goal Tracking Apps for 2023 (Free & Paid)

Contents

  * 1\. ClickUp
  * 2\. Clockify
  * 3\. Ambition
  * 4\. Lattice
  * 5\. Strides
  * 6\. GoalsOnTrack
  * 7\. Trello
  * 8\. Hive
  * 9\. Habitica
  * 10\. Profit.co
  * 11\. Todoist
  * 12\. Weekdone
  * Achieve More with a Goal Tracker App

Posted by The Friday Team

Do you have goals that you want to achieve but don’t know where to start?

Or maybe you're working on them as we speak but don't know how to keep track
of your progress?

That's what goal-tracking apps are for.

Stay productive with both your personal goals and business objectives through
goal tracking apps. Goal tracking apps will help you you track progress and
maintain habits that will help you succeed with your goals.

There are a lot of goal tracking apps and it will be a challenge to pick the
perfect goal tracker that will suit you.

Instead of having you test each app on your own, we did all the work and
narrowed down a list of the best goal tracking apps to help you succeed!

## 1\. ClickUp

ClickUp is an all-in-one project management and productivity tool that offers
hundreds of features, including a goal-tracking feature, ClickUp Goals.

When it comes to goal setting, ClickUp offers various tools and features that
can help users with personal and work goals. This goal-setting software helps
you track progress toward project completion every step of the way.

ClickUp Goals makes it easy to plan, track, and manage goals—all in one place.
Use ClickUp to manage all of your tasks, projects, and goals all in one place.
You can set personal goals for yourself and share goals with multiple owners
and stakeholders. And because your goals are stored within ClickUp, you’ll be
able to connect them to your work and keep your targets on top of your mind at
all times. Watch your overall progress move and get a better understanding of
how you will be able to better drive closer to success.

 _The listings featured on this site are from companies from which this site
may receive compensation. This may influence where, how and in which order
such listings appear. Brands such as ClickUp have an partnership stake in the
Friday website._

### Best Features

  * Stay on track to hit your goals with clear timelines, measurable targets, and automatic progress tracking
  * Track progress by setting your own customized targets
  * Organize multiple objectives into Goal Folders under one Folder for easy access

### Current Limitations

  * Table view is currently not available in the mobile app
  * Learning curve due to the number of widgets and customization tools

### Pricing

  * ClickUp has a Free Forever plan
  * Unlimited ($5 per member/month)
  * Business ($12 per member/month)
  * Business Plus ($19 per member/month)
  * Enterprise (contact sales)

“As a business owner, it's crucial that I can track my team's goals and target
status. I can easily run reports on ClickUp to see how well we are doing and
where I may need to remediate or follow up with individuals. ClickUp allows us
to set manageable targets to help individuals and teams reach their goals.
This has proven invaluable and was the deciding factor.” — Catherine Mack,
Owner, House Buyer Network

 _ **Sign up for ClickUp for free, no credit card required!**_

## 2\. Clockify

Track an unlimited number of goals while monitoring progress with Clockify.
This goal tracking app offers a number of features for free. Along with goal
tracking, it also helps track hours spent on projects. Managers or employers
can see how much time is spent on each task to help them find opportunities to
improve and further progress closer towards each goal. Clockify also comes
with a calendar view to help users visualize their overall schedule and block
their time for each specific task and project.

### Best Features

  * Track and break down multiple goals into smaller manageable tasks
  * Pomodoro timer helps a user stay focused by breaking work into short and focused chunks of time
  * Dashboard analytics supports progress for each goals by showing productivity trends

### Current Limitations

  * Mobile app has limited features and functionality
  * Limited integration capabilities with other applications
  * App can be glitchy with a slow internet connection

### Pricing

  * App is free to use
  * Extra features are offered with paid plans
  * Basic starts at $3.99 per user/month, Standard starts at $5.49 per user/month

“We started using Clockify last year and haven’t looked back. We can track as
many goals as we’d like and easily break them down into smaller, more
manageable tasks. We love that the dashboard analytics help us as we progress
toward our goals. By watching our own productivity trends, we can quickly see
where our time is being spent well or wasted and adjust our strategy
accordingly.”  — Jack Underwood, CEO & Co-Founder, Circuit

## 3\. Ambition

Ambition is an easy-to-use, customizable sales gamification tool that helps
drive and accelerate team performance. Compared to a standard goal tracking
app, Ambition helps drive activity and goals by incentivizing achievable
goals. Earn rewards by It is a great tool to help motivate individuals to
perform better each day. Mostly used by sales teams and departments, Ambition
pushes to promote competition to impact success. The tool has a simple and
intuitive interface with real-time performance insights that encourages a
performance-motivated working environment.

### Best Features

  * Break down smaller business goals into individual, daily, weekly, and monthly activities
  * Assign custom metrics by role for a better understanding of factors that drive success
  * Customize and automate notifications for key events with Workflows

### Current Limitations

  * Features and functionality can be improved 
  * Navigation between metrics and users can be difficult and complicated
  * Monthly charges can be steep for smaller teams and businesses

### Pricing

  * Gamify and Coach plans start at $750/month 
  * Pro plans with complete features start at $1,200/month

“Gamification of our customer retention rate accelerates our team members'
performance. This is especially crucial regarding email engagement, contract
type, and response time. The Ambition platform provides a fun and meaningful
way to track our team's incremental achievements and ensure they're
continually meeting their quotas rather than trying to crush them at the end
of the period, which definitely takes the edge off performance review time. As
a result, we booked hundreds of campaigns in H1FY22. And our NPS is now the
highest I've ever seen at 89, with an average of 8.92.” —Chris Gadek, VP of
Growth, AdQuick

## 4\. Lattice

Align and engage your employees to grow with Lattice. This people and
performance management platform is a solution to help with setting up goal
tracking with various tools and products. This goal tracking app can help
accelerate your team or business growth by integrating company OKRs and goals
into your team or employee’s routines. Keep your goals aligned while guiding
your team with their work. Allow Lattice to adopt and fully embody your goals
to stay motivated while driving business results. Lattice can be integrated
with various apps including Salesforce, Slack, and Microsoft Teams to make
your goals actionable.

### Best Features

  * Track goal progress with performance management
  * Increase employee engagement with 1:1s, status updates, and performance check-ins
  * Get actionable insights with advanced people analytics 

### Current Limitations

  * Does not offer a mobile version
  * Document management is not available
  * HR Management features are limited

### Pricing

  * Performance Management starts at $11 per person/month
  * Additional $4/person/month for Engagement and Grow features
  * Additional $6/person/month  for Compensation features

“Before landing on Lattice, we used a handful of free programs, but always had
issues with them. One of the biggest issues with these free apps was that
goals were never in the foreground. The dashboards and usability weren't
great, and ‌goal tracking became an afterthought. With Lattice, however, the
goals remain in sight (literally). The goals are always right in front of you
on the Lattice dashboard, and you can continually update them and monitor
progress. It has helped to create a hyper-focus on strategic goals at the team
level.” — John Ross, Chief Executive Officer, Test Prep Insight

## 5\. Strides

Build the perfect routine to help you or your team hit your goals. Strides is
a flexible goal-tracking app for all of your goal tracking needs. Develop good
habits and track your progress towards achieving each goal. Along with goal
setting, Stride also comes with charts and reporting to show success rates,
progress bars, and more.

### Best Features

  * Set SMART goals with a simple 3-step process
  * Log daily goals to stay focused
  * Unique on-track pace system to help users stay motivated

### Current Limitations

  * Reward system can be improved
  * App can sometimes feel glitchy

### Pricing

  * Free to use with an optional subscription
  * Paid plan offers unlimited trackers, backup, tags & filters, and more
  * Strides Plus at $4.99 per month, Strides Lifetime at $79.99

“We can track all of our goals, from daily to annually, and develop customized
reminders that are the right fit for our team and our individual workflows.” —
Arthur Worsley, Founder, The Art Of Living

## 6\. GoalsOnTrack

High achievers must adhere to a strict goal setting strategy to hit their
goals. GoalsOnTrack is a goal tracking app that will help users overcome
challenges to reaching their goals with a powerful goal achieving system.
Develop a strong goal setting skill with the help of this goal software. Get a
view of your major targets with the tasks and habits that you need to keep to
achieve your goals. GoalsOnTrack also provides an interactive stats chart to
show completed tasks, habits checked to help users better understand how
progress is made and identify areas for improvement.

### Best Features

  * Create SMART Goals to define and make each goal achievable
  * Supports multi-level structure which allows users to break down big and long-term goals into smaller goals
  * Track progress by sub-goals, tasks, outcomes, and manually

### Current Limitations

  * API is not available
  * Limited integrations with other commonly used applications
  * Mobile version is not available for Android users

### Pricing

  * GoalsOnTrack membership costs $68 per year
  * Team subscription rate is available depending on selected plan

## 7\. Trello

Trello is a popular tool known to help manage tasks and projects but is also a
versatile tool that supports goal tracking through various features and tools.
This task and goal management solution is also a goal tracking app that
features a visual board to give you an overview of tasks and goals in a list
format. Trello is a user-friendly tool with a simple drag-and-drop board to
help manage tasks and show users overall project progress.

### Best Features

  * Simple and easy to use interface with a variety of integration options
  * Wide range of automation tools and features
  * Powerful mobile application

### Current Limitations

  * Limited to a Kanban board view
  * Reporting and analytics are currently not available
  * Lacks the features needed by agile teams

### Pricing

  * Free plan is available for individuals and teams
  * Standard plan $5 per user/month, Premium plan $10 per user/month, Enterprise $17.50 per user/month

“My team uses Trello for goal tracking in their business. I find Trello easy
to use and implement, and it's not very difficult to get team members trained
and onboarded. Another reason I chose Trello over other tools is that the
price is excellent. Trello gives our team everything we need to be successful
and keeps up with all the happenings within the company. My team loves the
tool, and I honestly don't see us using anything different anytime soon.” —
Alex Mastin, CEO & Founder, Home Grounds

## 8\. Hive

Hive is a project management tool and a goal tracker app made for hybrid
teams. This cloud collaborative software is perfect for managers or employers
with remote teams to keep their teams engaged when it comes to collaboration.
The Hive app follows a simple process of allowing users to create a project,
delegate tasks, and use action templates to automate repetitive tasks. For
goal tracking and management, Hive comes with goal reminders and live chat
updates to maintain a strong communication line between team members about
projects and goals.

### Best Features

  * AI features include custom workflows, messaging, and collaboration
  * Native third-party integrations with tools such as Microsoft Teams, Google Workspace, JIRA, and Salesforce
  * Resource utilization charts help track productivity to keep tasks on track

### Current Limitations

  * Slight bugs and limited platform access during updates
  * Mobile application functionality is reduced compared to the desktop version

### Pricing

  * Solo plan is free forever
  * Teams plan $12 per user/month
  * Enterprise plan is available for larger teams

“In the past, many popular goal-tracking solutions have left us unsatisfied.
Some are too clunky, and others lack an interesting enough feature set to keep
teams engaged. Fast forward to now, and we've seen outstanding success with
Hive. What originally drew us to Hive was its seamless workflow approval
system and how easily teams can collaborate on projects from wherever they're
working from. Hive offers a refreshing level of efficiency, and its sleek user
interface has helped our team cut down their administrative workload by a
staggering 50%. These practicalities truly sealed the deal for us on bringing
Hive into our tech stack.” — Max Wesman, Chief Operating Officer, GoodHire

Need other project management options? Check out our list of the top Hive
alternatives for project management!

## 9\. Habitica

Make completing tasks fun with a goal tracking app that gives virtual rewards
to keep teams and users motivated. Habitica makes goal tracking fun with
gamification, a unique feature that is similar to a role-playing game with in-
game rewards and punishments to keep you motivated to achieve your goals.

### Best Features

  * Fully customizable to help users better track goals and habits
  * Easy-to-use mobile app and web interface
  * API provides easy integration with various apps

### Current Limitations

  * Lack of restrictions for completing habits and goals which can lead to cheating
  * App does not come with a free plan

### Pricing

  * General subscription starts at $5/month
  * Group plans start at $9/month or $3/member

“I’m a big fan of Habitica because it’s primarily designed for teams and goes
deeper than goal tracking; it’ll also track your good and bad habits. This
allows you and your team to visualize your progress and find areas for
improvement. But what differentiates Habitica from other apps is that it uses
video game concepts to help you reach your goals and build stronger habits.
This gamification makes setting measurable, meaningful targets simple, and you
receive upper-level feedback as you reach your goals.” — Scott Lieberman,
Owner, Touchdown Money

## 10\. Profit.co

Execute strategies with an OKR approach with Profit.co’s intuitive task
management software. Align your objectives and key results with tasks to make
your team’s work more efficient. Profit.co allows users to manage workflow and
streamline project execution with the software’s customizable features to
drive a high-performance work culture. Complete your team’s individual and
overall goals while managing your people and process all in one platform.

### Best Features

  * Boost employee productivity with highly customizable and easy to use goal setting software
  * Built-in step-by-step guides and templates to create instant OKRs
  * Visual dashboard to show progress, problems, and course of goals and tasks

### Current Limitations

  * Task management is limited for heavy workloads
  * Learning curve due to number of customization features

### Pricing

  * Free for up to five users
  * Growth plan starts at $7/month per user

## 11\. Todoist

Stay focused and calm whenever big due dates are coming your way by being
organized with Todoist. This productivity app is a platform that can help
users hit big goals through managing and tracking projects and tasks. Todoist
comes with core features that make it easy to get a look at tasks, subtasks,
priority levels, due dates, and more. Focus your energy on completing tasks
rather than fixing your schedule and deadlines. Todoist will simplify your
entire schedule and workflow from your personal tasks to your professional
goals.

### Best Features

  * Centralize your workflow by integrating with other notable tools and applications
  * Personalize your projects with a simple yet versatile board view
  * Kickstart projects with ready to use board templates

###  **Current Limitations**

  * Automatic backups and reminders are unavailable for free version
  * Recurring updates can disrupt workflow at times

###  **Pricing**

  * Free to use for starters
  * Pro plan starts at $4 per month
  * Business plan for teams start at $6 per user / month  
  
 **Trello vs Todoist: Which Tool is Better for Project Management?**

## 12\. Weekdone

Weekdone is a goal tracking app that also offers OKR features for companies
and businesses. Set structured goals, track weekly progress, and identify
areas for improvement with the help of this OKR platform. Improve your team
coordination and stay aligned with other members of your team through weekly
updates and team meetings. Weekdone allows team leaders to hold specific team
members accountable for their tasks to improve coordination and productivity.

### Best Features

  * Great for tracking OKR progress and goals
  * Easy access through cloud-based platform
  * Improve collaboration and productivity through feedback 

### Current Limitations

  * Setting up OKRs can be time consuming
  * Limited integrations with other organizational and project management tools

### Pricing

  * Free up to 3 users
  * Unlimited plan for 4-10 users start at $90 per month

## Achieve More with a Goal Tracker App

Excited to start working on your goals? These goal-tracking tools can help
you. Each tool offers a unique set of features for tracking, managing, setting
goals, and more. But we get it. It’s difficult to pick the one which will fit
you best.

If you need a tool that offers you full flexibility and functionality, ClickUp
can give you that and more! It offers you the right tools, integration
capabilities, and customization features to help you create the perfect
workflow to hit your goals.

Build, organize, and manage your goals with an all-in-one goal tracking
application. Complete your to-do lists and tasks and develop productive habits
with the help of ClickUp so you can easily hit your goals every time.

Working on your goals can be a lot on its own. Why not make it simpler and
easier by using ClickUp Goals?

# ClickUp Pricing: How Much Does ClickUp Cost?

Contents

  * Can I use ClickUp for free?
  * When do I need to pay for upgraded ClickUp plans?
  * When to Upgrade Your Free ClickUp Plan 
  * ClickUp Pricing
  * Should You Pay for ClickUp?

Posted by The Friday Team

ClickUp is an all-in-one productivity app and project management software
designed for all users to achieve their goals—from solo entrepreneurs to large
enterprises.

It has hundreds of collaboration tools and communication features to help
every type of user achieve different goals.

ClickUp offers a feature-rich experience and the flexibility to boost
productivity, track progress, and achieve business goals.

ClickUp can be customized to provide each individual user with an intuitive
experience for delivering multiple projects, handling a team, and managing an
entire organization. This makes it a great solution for any user, team, and
organization.

## Can I use ClickUp for free?

Anyone can sign-up for a free account with ClickUp.

Individuals using ClickUp for personal use can access the app for free with
ClickUp’s Free Forever Plan. This provides unlimited tasks and members as well
as 100MB of storage. It also provides access to most ClickUp features such as:

  * Two-Factor Authentication
  * Collaborative Docs
  * Whiteboards
  * Everything View
  * Real-Time Chat
  * Kanban Boards
  * Sprint Management
  * Native Time Tracking
  * Calendar View
  * In-App Video Recording
  * 24/7 Support

If you’re just starting out and are using a project management app for the
first time or for personal use, this is a great option that will give you
access to ClickUp’s intuitive features which are offered by other apps through
a paid plan.

Team leaders, project managers, professionals, and freelancers looking for
more advanced project management features, additional integrations, storage
space, and support can take a look at ClickUp’s plans. The pricing of the paid
plans depends on the number of users and the features included.

Here’s a quick overview of ClickUp’s Pricing Plans to help you when choosing
the best plan for the size of your team or business.

Aside from the size of your team, there is also a difference in the amount of
capabilities offered with each upgraded plan. Regardless of your account type,
ClickUp is still a great project management platform for individuals and small
teams who need a reliable and feature-rich task management app without the
need for advanced integrations and customizations.

Try ClickUp and sign-up for a free account today!

## When do I need to pay for upgraded ClickUp plans?

Sometimes the Free Forever Plan is all you need if you’re working by yourself
or with a small team, but at times you’ll need to upgrade. Even with the best
project management software, a free plan may not be enough especially for
rapidly growing teams and businesses to manage their project management flow.

### ClickUp Free Limitations

While ClickUp’s Free Forever Plan is packed with the essential tools and
functions to handle and manage projects, it only offers 100MB of storage space
and allows users to create up to five spaces. This may not be the best option
for multiple teams handling a variety of projects and tasks./

Organizations with multiple departments will also need a separate space for
each team. On top of a bigger storage and number of workspaces to cater
multiple departments, handling more complex projects will require more
advanced features, integrations, and support than what the free plan offers.

### ClickUp Free vs Paid

The paid plans offer additional features such as custom fields, automation,
integrations, and priority support.

Additionally, if you value the time and efficiency that ClickUp can bring to
your work processes, the investment in a paid plan may be worthwhile.

It is always a good idea to evaluate your specific needs and budget. You
should also be able to compare ClickUp's pricing and features with other
project management tools to determine if it is the right fit for you.

Ultimately, the decision to pay for ClickUp depends on your specific needs and
budget. You may want to compare the features and pricing of ClickUp with other
project management tools to determine which option offers the best value for
you.

## When to Upgrade Your Free ClickUp Plan

### Bigger Storage Space

If you have a lot of files and attachments that you need to store, you may run
out of storage space on the free plan. Upgrading to a paid plan will give you
access to unlimited storage space.

### Advanced Integrations

ClickUp's paid plans offer a wider range of integrations with other tools such
as Salesforce, GitHub, and HubSpot, which can help you automate your workflow
and improve productivity.

### Advanced Functions

If you need more advanced customization options such as unlimited Gantt
charts, guest permissions, custom exporting, custom role creation, and SSO,
upgrading to a paid plan will give you access to these features.

### Multiple Team Management

If you have a large team, you may need the additional features and permissions
that are only available on ClickUp's paid plans. These include features such
as time tracking, workload management, and user roles and permissions.

Consider upgrading to a paid ClickUp plan when you need more advanced
features, integrations, and support than what the free plan offers, or when
you have a large team that requires additional management features.

## ClickUp Pricing

### ClickUp Usage Pricing

ClickUp’s Free Forever plan offers unlimited tasks, 5 spaces, 100 lists/space,
and custom views. With an Unlimited plan, users will get 200 lists/space and
folders/space which is great for slightly bigger teams or small business
owners.

For $12/user per month, 400 lists/space and folders/space will be provided. A
Business Plus upgrade has twice the number and provides 1000 lists/space and
folders/space.

All accounts with upgraded plans will get unlimited storage.

### ClickUp Customization Pricing

For customization options, Free and Unlimited plan users will have to upgrade
to a Business plan to get access to Custom Task IDs. Users looking for more
than 100 automations will have to upgrade to ClickUp’s Unlimited Plan to get
1000 automations per month and to a Business Plan to get 10,000 automations
per month plus multiple actions and conditions.

### ClickUp Enterprise Pricing

Bigger organizations with multiple departments might need more which might
make it ideal to get a Business Plus plan with 25,000 automations and an
Enterprise plan with up to 250,000 automations. Organizations who are looking
for White Labeling may obtain it through an Enterprise plan.

ClickUp’s Enterprise pricing depends on the size of your organization, the
number of workspaces and views, and the number of advanced features you need.

### ClickUp Integration Pricing

Advanced time tracking features such as labels and billable time is only
available from Business plans and above.

### ClickUp Security Costs

ClickUp’s Free Forever Plan only offers Two-Factor Authentication as
protection. Additional SMS for Two-factor authentication is only available
from a Business plan upgrade and above.

Single Sign-On Options from sites such as Google is offered through a Business
Plan. Microsoft users will need a Business Plus upgrade for SSO which also
includes Custom SAML and OKTA SSO.

Advanced security features such as custom roles, managed private spaces,
restricted public sharing, and more will have to get a custom Enterprise plan.

### ClickUp Student Pricing

ClickUp is also a great application for managing academic and administrative
resources. You may contact ClickUp at help@clickup.com to discuss and create a
customized pricing plan according to your budget. Along with student pricing,
ClickUp offers discounts for non-profit organizations and groups.

## Should You Pay for ClickUp?

ClickUp offers both free and paid plans, with the paid plans providing
additional features and functionality.

If you are a small team or an individual looking for a simple project
management tool, a Free or Unlimited plan might be enough for the time being.

If you are in need of more advanced features, such as custom permissions,
automation, custom fields, and reporting, you may want to consider upgrading
to a paid plan. You can try ClickUp for free by signing up with a free account
today!
